name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Data Platform Engineer with 13+ years of experience in data governance and metadata management, specializing in **Databricks Unity Catalog**, **Collibra**, **SQL**, and **Python**. Proven ability to implement robust CI/CD pipelines and manage complex Azure Cloud environments, leveraging **Azure DevOps**, **Azure CLI**, and **PowerShell**. Expertise in data lineage and security best practices, including RBAC and ABAC in compliance frameworks such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Demonstrated capability in collaborating within Agile environments to drive analytical solutions and optimize cloud-native applications.
Additionally, hands-on experience in developing high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries with proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and backend frameworks like **FastAPI** and **Django**. Strong background in building AI/ML platforms and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, MLOps strategies using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
